title: Pizza topped with cotton candy served for cherry blossom season
text:
Pizza topped with cotton candy served for cherry blossom season INQUIRER.net / 07:52 PM March 28, 2017 Image: Schmatz Beer Dining 
A certain pub in Tokyo has prepared a special dish to celebrate the cherry blossom season. It’s a combination of three joy-inducing things in this world: pizza, candy and cherry blossoms. 
This dish is aptly named the sakura cotton candy pizza and it is quite a sight to behold. It’s basically a thin-crust, three-cheese pizza with honey ginger sauce drizzled over the cotton candy topping, reports RocketNews24. 
The sakura pizza is currently being served by Schmatz Beer Dining at their three branches from March 27 to April 2. ADVERTISEMENT 
If you’re ever in the area, don’t miss out on this fluffy one-of-a-kind pizza. Alfred Bayle/ JB
